name: fishing
chn: n. 钓鱼, 捕鱼业 (或活动)
example_en: He enjoys fishing in the lake near his house every weekend.
example_cn: 他每个周末都喜欢在家附近的湖里钓鱼。
word_family: fish (n. 鱼, v. 钓鱼), fisherman (n. 渔夫), fishery (n. 渔业)
memory_tips: 词根 'fish' 表示鱼，后缀 '-ing' 表示活动或过程。联想记忆：想象一个人在湖边钓鱼的场景，鱼竿、鱼线和鱼钩都是钓鱼的必备工具。图像记忆：可以画一个人在湖边钓鱼的简单图画，旁边有鱼和鱼竿。

image_prompt.main_image: A serene lake with a person sitting on a dock holding a fishing rod, with a small boat in the background and a few fish jumping out of the water.
image_prompt.example_image: A man sitting by a lake with a fishing rod, a cooler beside him, and a few fish caught in a net nearby.
